CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 20, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Terpsichoreans - These bright-eyed youngsters, Betty Love, Lendia O. Jackson, Patricia L. Chavis, Relda K. Tames and Mary Eaton, will be among the many participants who will appear on the Talent Night program sponsored by the Beauty Shop Owners' Association of Pennsylvania. The affair will be staged Oct. 25, at Schenley High School Auditorium. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of child dancers: Betty Love, Lendia O. Jackson, Patricia L. Chavis, Relda K. Tames, and Mary Eaton, wearing headdress, halter tops, and harem pant dance costumes, posed with hands in prayer position, in Harris Studio, another version
